attributes.action: Send a message to David Cameron that you will vote to leave the EU.
attributes.additional_details:
National insurance contributions required to get full pension raised from 30 to 35 years.
Pension ages rising from 60/65 to 65/67(set to go higher)
Welfare cuts to working class families.
Life saving cancer drugs denied to people.
We have just signed up to another £1.1 billion aid package
The EU is in a mess.It is bloated ,corrupt,self serving and a huge waste of our money.Leave or renegotiate full control of decisions back to the UK.THIS IS THE ONLY WAY WE CAN MAKE THEM LISTEN.
attributes.background:
We must stop illegal economic immigration into the UK.We must remove illegal migrants already here hiding behind human rights.We must renegotiate numbers allowed here from inside the EU.
We are seeing pension ages rise, cancer drugs cut, people struggling to pay bills and buy food.

rejection.details: You may wish to draft a petition which (for example) requests the Government to adopt a policy of leaving the EU.  Any resubmitted petition will be considered again.
